member.name: M:MapConnection.CoordinateSystems.GetCurrentCoordinateSystem
member.summary: Node GetCurrentCoordinateSystem return the name of current CS (assigned to drawing)

member.name: M:MapConnection.CoordinateSystems.GetFullWKTCodeOfCS(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Node GetFullWKTCodeOfCS return full WKT code of input CS's name (include geodetic datum)
member.param: Absolute Path to XML-Definition of MapCSLibrary
member.returns: Full-WKT code of CS and "Console" - text string with exeptions (if code doesn't finished)

member.name: M:MapConnection.MapCSLibrary.CS_Language_RUS
member.summary: CS_Language_RUS return system values for creation LSP file, if program language is Russian
member.returns: CS_value, CS_Agree - give them to GetPartOfMAPCSLIBRARY or GetAllOfMAPCSLIBRARY

member.name: M:MapConnection.MapCSLibrary.CS_Language_ENG
member.summary: CS_Language_ENG return system values for creation LSP file, if program language is English
member.returns: CS_value, CS_Agree - give them to GetPartOfMAPCSLIBRARY or GetAllOfMAPCSLIBRARY

member.name: M:MapConnection.MapCSLibrary.GetPartOfMAPCSLIBRARY(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Node GetListOfMAPCSLIBRAR for export to LSP file naming of coordinate systems (user or system)
member.param: If false - exporting only User's definitions; if true - exporting only system definitions
Permit to add other associated definitions
Directory path to save LSP file

member.name: M:MapConnection.MapCSLibrary.GetAllOfMAPCSLIBRARY(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Node GetListOfMAPCSLIBRAR for export to LSP file naming of coordinate systems (all library)
member.param: Permit to add other associated definitions
Directory path to save LSP file

member.name: M:MapConnection.MapCSLibrary.GetListAndCountOfCategories
member.summary: Node GetListAndCountOfCategories returns a list of all Categories in MapCSLibrary and count of them
member.returns: Count of Categories and result List

member.name: M:MapConnection.MapCSLibrary.RenameCurrentCategory(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Node RenameCurrentCategory rename Category form MapCSLibrary

member.name: M:MapConnection.MapCSLibrary.GetFullWKTCodeOfAllCS(System.String,System.Boolean,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Node GetFullWKTCodeOfAllCS create a List and external txt file with FullWKT codes of coordinate systems in MapCSLibrary
